text: Barberêche (; Dictionnaire-Dikchenéro: Français-Patois/Patê-Franché. Société cantonale des patoisans fribourgeois. Fribourg: 2013. p. 71) was a municipality of the district of See in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. It lies on the "language boundary" between the French- and German-speaking parts of Switzerland. On 1 January 2017, the former municipalities of Barberêche, Villarepos and Wallenried merged into the municipality of Courtepin.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 10 January 2017 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Former municipalities of Fribourg
title: Barberêche
